comments.text: I want to know which bugs some given user commented to in the last X days. But boolean charts only have "commenter" and "comment is private" and "comment" available. It should also contain "comment date".
comments.author: LpSolit@gmail.com
comments.creator: LpSolit@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: I want to know which bugs some given user commented to in the last X days. But boolean charts only have "commenter" and "comment is private" and "comment" available. It should also contain "comment date".
